bounties.title: FEMA Assistance for December Windstorm
bounties.description: Governor Larry Rhoden is requesting FEMA assistance for damages caused during the December windstorm. The windstorm caused over $1.7M in damages across South Dakota.

bounties.title: Drought Conditions in South Dakota
bounties.description: Dry winter conditions are causing drought to creep back into South Dakota, particularly in the southern and eastern parts of the state.
